price: Sε anyame bi wͻ soro ne asaase so ka Nyankopͻn ho a anka (ͻsoro ne asaase) mmienu (nyinaa) asεe. Kronkron Hene ne Nyankopͻn, Animuonyam ahennie Wura no, Ɔso kyεn sεdeε wͻde susu no no.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ فِيهِمَآ ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَاۚ فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: law kāna fīhimā ālihatun illā al-lahu lafasadatā fasub'ḥāna al-lahi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
